mapper.select:
SELECT 対象者情報一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo" AS 対象者情報_被保険者番号,
収納情報."choteiNendo" AS 賦課_調定年度, 収納情報."fukaNendo" AS 賦課_賦課年度, 収納情報."tsuchishoNo" AS 賦課_通知書番号, 収納情報."rirekiNo" AS 賦課_履歴番号, 収納情報."hihokenshaNo" AS 賦課_被保険者番号, 収納情報."shikibetsuCode" AS 賦課_識別コード, 収納情報."setaiCode" AS 賦課_世帯コード, 収納情報."setaiInsu" AS 賦課_世帯員数, 収納情報."shikakuShutokuYMD" AS 賦課_資格取得日, 収納情報."shikakuShutokuJiyu" AS 賦課_資格取得事由, 収納情報."shikakuSoshitsuYMD" AS 賦課_資格喪失日, 収納情報."shikakuSoshitsuJiyu" AS 賦課_資格喪失事由, 収納情報."seihofujoShurui" AS 賦課_生活保護扶助種類, 収納情報."seihoKaishiYMD" AS 賦課_生保開始日, 収納情報."seihoHaishiYMD" AS 賦課_生保廃止日, 収納情報."ronenKaishiYMD" AS 賦課_老年開始日, 収納情報."ronenHaishiYMD" AS 賦課_老年廃止日, 収納情報."fukaYMD" AS 賦課_賦課期日, 収納情報."kazeiKubun" AS 賦課_課税区分, 収納情報."setaikazeiKubun" AS 賦課_世帯課税区分, 収納情報."gokeiShotokuGaku" AS 賦課_合計所得金額, 収納情報."nenkinShunyuGaku" AS 賦課_公的年金収入額, 収納情報."hokenryoDankai" AS 賦課_保険料段階, 収納情報."hokenryoDankai1" AS 賦課_保険料算定段階1, 収納情報."nengakuHokenryo1" AS 賦課_算定年額保険料1, 収納情報."tsukiwariStartYM1" AS 賦課_月割開始年月1, 収納情報."tsukiwariEndYM1" AS 賦課_月割終了年月1, 収納情報."hokenryoDankai2" AS 賦課_保険料算定段階2, 収納情報."nengakuHokenryo2" AS 賦課_算定年額保険料2, 収納情報."tsukiwariStartYM2" AS 賦課_月割開始年月2, 収納情報."tsukiwariEndYM2" AS 賦課_月割終了年月2, 収納情報."choteiNichiji" AS 賦課_調定日時, 収納情報."choteiJiyu1" AS 賦課_調定事由1, 収納情報."choteiJiyu2" AS 賦課_調定事由2, 収納情報."choteiJiyu3" AS 賦課_調定事由3, 収納情報."choteiJiyu4" AS 賦課_調定事由4, 収納情報."koseiM" AS 賦課_更正月, 収納情報."gemmenMaeHokenryo" AS 賦課_減免前介護保険料（年額）, 収納情報."gemmenGaku" AS 賦課_減免額, 収納情報."kakuteiHokenryo" AS 賦課_確定介護保険料（年額）, 収納情報."hokenryoDankaiKarisanntei" AS 賦課_保険料段階（仮算定時）, 収納情報."choshuHohoRirekiNo" AS 賦課_徴収方法履歴番号, 収納情報."idoKijunNichiji" AS 賦課_異動基準日時, 収納情報."kozaKubun" AS 賦課_口座区分, 収納情報."kyokaisoKubun" AS 賦課_境界層区分, 収納情報."shokkenKubun" AS 賦課_職権区分, 収納情報."fukaShichosonCode" AS 賦課_賦課市町村コード, 収納情報."tkSaishutsuKampuGaku" AS 賦課_特徴歳出還付額, 収納情報."fuSaishutsuKampuGaku" AS 賦課_普徴歳出還付額, 収納情報."k_choteiNendo" AS 介護期別_調定年度, 収納情報."k_fukaNendo" AS 介護期別_賦課年度, 収納情報."k_tsuchishoNo" AS 介護期別_通知書番号, 収納情報."k_rirekiNo" AS 介護期別_履歴番号, 収納情報."k_choshuHouhou" AS 介護期別_徴収方法, 収納情報."k_ki" AS 介護期別_期, 収納情報."k_choteiId" AS 介護期別_調定ID, 収納情報."c_choteiId" AS 調定共通_介護継承_調定ID, 収納情報."c_rirekiNo" AS 調定共通_介護継承_履歴番号, 収納情報."c_shunoId" AS 調定共通_介護継承_収納ID, 収納情報."c_kaikeiNendo" AS 調定共通_介護継承_会計年度, 収納情報."c_shoriNendo" AS 調定共通_介護継承_処理年度, 収納情報."c_shoriNo" AS 調定共通_介護継承_処理番号, 収納情報."c_koseiKaisu" AS 調定共通_介護継承_更正回数, 収納情報."c_choteiJiyuCode" AS 調定共通_介護継承_調定事由コード, 収納情報."c_choteiYMD" AS 調定共通_介護継承_調定年月日, 収納情報."c_choteigaku" AS 調定共通_介護継承_調定額, 収納情報."c_shohizei" AS 調定共通_介護継承_消費税額, 収納情報."c_nokigenYMD" AS 調定共通_介護継承_納期限, 収納情報."c_hoteiNokigenToYMD" AS 調定共通_介護継承_法定納期限等, 収納情報."c_fukaShoriJokyo" AS 調定共通_介護継承_賦課処理状況, 収納情報."j_shoKisaiHokenshaNo" AS 時効_証記載保険者番号, 収納情報."j_hihokenshaNo" AS 時効_被保険者番号, 収納情報."j_choteiNendo" AS 時効_調定年度, 収納情報."j_fukaNendo" AS 時効_賦課年度, 収納情報."j_tokucho_FuchoKubun" AS 時効_特徴_普徴区分, 収納情報."j_tsuchishoNo" AS 時効_通知書番号, 収納情報."j_shuno_Ki_Tsuki" AS 時効_収納期_月, 収納情報."j_rirekiNo" AS 時効_履歴番号, 収納情報."j_jikoKisanYMD" AS 時効_時効起算年月日, 収納情報."j_jikoKisanYMDKubun" AS 時効_時効起算日区分, 収納情報."j_logicalDeletedFlag" AS 時効_論理削除フラグ, 収入."shunyuId" AS 収入_収入ID, 収入."shunoId" AS 収入_収納ID, 収入."shunyugaku" AS 収入_収入額, 収入."shunyuYMD" AS 収入_収入年月日, CaT1018_督促状発行履歴."shunoId" AS 督促状発行履歴_収納ID, CaT1018_督促状発行履歴."tokusokujoHakkoYMD" AS 督促状発行履歴_督促状発行年月日 FROM "ShiharaiHohoHenkoTainoTempTable" AS 対象者情報一時テーブル LEFT JOIN ( SELECT 賦課Newest."hihokenshaNo" AS 被保険者番号, 調定共通_介護継承."shunoId" AS 収納ID, 賦課Newest."choteiNendo" AS 調定年度, 賦課Newest."choteiNendo", 賦課Newest."fukaNendo", 賦課Newest."tsuchishoNo", 賦課Newest."rirekiNo", 賦課Newest."hihokenshaNo", 賦課Newest."shikibetsuCode", 賦課Newest."setaiCode", 賦課Newest."setaiInsu", 賦課Newest."shikakuShutokuYMD", 賦課Newest."shikakuShutokuJiyu", 賦課Newest."shikakuSoshitsuYMD", 賦課Newest."shikakuSoshitsuJiyu", 賦課Newest."seihofujoShurui", 賦課Newest."seihoKaishiYMD", 賦課Newest."seihoHaishiYMD", 賦課Newest."ronenKaishiYMD", 賦課Newest."ronenHaishiYMD", 賦課Newest."fukaYMD", 賦課Newest."kazeiKubun", 賦課Newest."setaikazeiKubun", 賦課Newest."gokeiShotokuGaku", 賦課Newest."nenkinShunyuGaku", 賦課Newest."hokenryoDankai", 賦課Newest."hokenryoDankai1", 賦課Newest."nengakuHokenryo1", 賦課Newest."tsukiwariStartYM1", 賦課Newest."tsukiwariEndYM1", 賦課Newest."hokenryoDankai2", 賦課Newest."nengakuHokenryo2", 賦課Newest."tsukiwariStartYM2", 賦課Newest."tsukiwariEndYM2", 賦課Newest."choteiNichiji", 賦課Newest."choteiJiyu1", 賦課Newest."choteiJiyu2", 賦課Newest."choteiJiyu3", 賦課Newest."choteiJiyu4", 賦課Newest."koseiM", 賦課Newest."gemmenMaeHokenryo", 賦課Newest."gemmenGaku", 賦課Newest."kakuteiHokenryo", 賦課Newest."hokenryoDankaiKarisanntei", 賦課Newest."choshuHohoRirekiNo", 賦課Newest."idoKijunNichiji", 賦課Newest."kozaKubun", 賦課Newest."kyokaisoKubun", 賦課Newest."shokkenKubun", 賦課Newest."fukaShichosonCode", 賦課Newest."tkSaishutsuKampuGaku", 賦課Newest."fuSaishutsuKampuGaku", 介護期別."choteiNendo" AS "k_choteiNendo", 介護期別."fukaNendo" AS "k_fukaNendo", 介護期別."tsuchishoNo" AS "k_tsuchishoNo", 介護期別."rirekiNo" AS "k_rirekiNo", 介護期別."choshuHouhou" AS "k_choshuHouhou", 介護期別."ki" AS "k_ki", 介護期別."choteiId" AS "k_choteiId", 調定共通_介護継承."choteiId" AS "c_choteiId", 調定共通_介護継承."rirekiNo" AS "c_rirekiNo", 調定共通_介護継承."shunoId" AS "c_shunoId", 調定共通_介護継承."kaikeiNendo" AS "c_kaikeiNendo", 調定共通_介護継承."shoriNendo" AS "c_shoriNendo", 調定共通_介護継承."shoriNo" AS "c_shoriNo", 調定共通_介護継承."koseiKaisu" AS "c_koseiKaisu", 調定共通_介護継承."choteiJiyuCode" AS "c_choteiJiyuCode", 調定共通_介護継承."choteiYMD" AS "c_choteiYMD", 調定共通_介護継承."choteigaku" AS "c_choteigaku", 調定共通_介護継承."shohizei" AS "c_shohizei", 調定共通_介護継承."nokigenYMD" AS "c_nokigenYMD", 調定共通_介護継承."hoteiNokigenToYMD" AS "c_hoteiNokigenToYMD", 調定共通_介護継承."fukaShoriJokyo" AS "c_fukaShoriJokyo", 時効起算日管理."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" AS "j_shoKisaiHokenshaNo", 時効起算日管理."hihokenshaNo" AS "j_hihokenshaNo", 時効起算日管理."choteiNendo" AS "j_choteiNendo", 時効起算日管理."fukaNendo" AS "j_fukaNendo", 時効起算日管理."tokucho_FuchoKubun" AS "j_tokucho_FuchoKubun", 時効起算日管理."tsuchishoNo" AS "j_tsuchishoNo", 時効起算日管理."shuno_Ki_Tsuki" AS "j_shuno_Ki_Tsuki", 時効起算日管理."rirekiNo" AS "j_rirekiNo", 時効起算日管理."jikoKisanYMD" AS "j_jikoKisanYMD", 時効起算日管理."jikoKisanYMDKubun" AS "j_jikoKisanYMDKubun", 時効起算日管理."logicalDeletedFlag" AS "j_logicalDeletedFlag" FROM rgdb."DbV2002Fuka" AS 賦課Newest INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT2003Kibetsu" AS 介護期別 ON 賦課Newest."choteiNendo" = 介護期別."choteiNendo" AND 賦課Newest."fukaNendo" = 介護期別."fukaNendo" AND 賦課Newest."tsuchishoNo" = 介護期別."tsuchishoNo" AND 賦課Newest."rirekiNo" = 介護期別."rirekiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu" AS 調定共通_介護継承 ON 介護期別."choteiId" = 調定共通_介護継承."choteiId" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT 時効起算日管理_明細."shoKisaiHokenshaNo", 時効起算日管理_明細."hihokenshaNo", 時効起算日管理_明細."choteiNendo", 時効起算日管理_明細."fukaNendo", 時効起算日管理_明細."tokucho_FuchoKubun", 時効起算日管理_明細."tsuchishoNo", 時効起算日管理_明細."shuno_Ki_Tsuki", 時効起算日管理_明細."rirekiNo", 時効起算日管理_明細."jikoKisanYMD", 時効起算日管理_明細."jikoKisanYMDKubun", 時効起算日管理_明細."logicalDeletedFlag" FROM rgdb."DbT4023JikoKisambiKanri" AS 時効起算日管理_明細 INNER JOIN ( SELECT "hihokenshaNo", "choteiNendo", "fukaNendo", "tokucho_FuchoKubun", "tsuchishoNo", "shuno_Ki_Tsuki", max("jikoKisanYMD") AS 時効起算年月日 FROM rgdb."DbT4023JikoKisambiKanri" AS 時効起算日管理temp WHERE 時効起算日管理temp."tokucho_FuchoKubun" = '2' GROUP BY "hihokenshaNo", "choteiNendo", "fukaNendo", "tokucho_FuchoKubun", "tsuchishoNo", "shuno_Ki_Tsuki" ) 時効起算日管理_最大情報 ON 時効起算日管理_最大情報."hihokenshaNo" = 時効起算日管理_明細."hihokenshaNo" AND 時効起算日管理_最大情報."choteiNendo" = 時効起算日管理_明細."choteiNendo" AND 時効起算日管理_最大情報."fukaNendo" = 時効起算日管理_明細."fukaNendo" AND 時効起算日管理_最大情報."tsuchishoNo" = 時効起算日管理_明細."tsuchishoNo" AND 時効起算日管理_最大情報."shuno_Ki_Tsuki" = 時効起算日管理_明細."shuno_Ki_Tsuki" AND 時効起算日管理_最大情報."tokucho_FuchoKubun" = 時効起算日管理_明細."tokucho_FuchoKubun" AND 時効起算日管理_最大情報.時効起算年月日 = 時効起算日管理_明細."jikoKisanYMD" )AS 時効起算日管理 ON 賦課Newest."hihokenshaNo" = 時効起算日管理."hihokenshaNo" AND 賦課Newest."choteiNendo" = 時効起算日管理."choteiNendo" AND 賦課Newest."fukaNendo" = 時効起算日管理."fukaNendo" AND 賦課Newest."tsuchishoNo" = 時効起算日管理."tsuchishoNo" AND cast(介護期別."ki" as varchar(3)) = 時効起算日管理."shuno_Ki_Tsuki" AND 介護期別."choshuHouhou" = 時効起算日管理."tokucho_FuchoKubun" WHERE 介護期別."choshuHouhou" = '2' )AS 収納情報 ON 対象者情報一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo" = 収納情報.被保険者番号 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CaT1018_督促状発行履歴_明細."shunoId", CaT1018_督促状発行履歴_明細."tokusokujoHakkoYMD" FROM rgca."CaT1018TokusokuHakkoRireki" AS CaT1018_督促状発行履歴_明細 INNER JOIN ( SELECT "shunoId", max("tokusokujoHakkoYMD") AS 督促状発行年月日 FROM rgca."CaT1018TokusokuHakkoRireki" AS CaT1018_督促状発行履歴temp WHERE CaT1018_督促状発行履歴temp."tokusokujoHakkoYMD" <= #{基準日RDate} GROUP BY "shunoId" ) CaT1018_督促状発行履歴_最大 ON CaT1018_督促状発行履歴_明細."shunoId" = CaT1018_督促状発行履歴_最大."shunoId" AND CaT1018_督促状発行履歴_明細."tokusokujoHakkoYMD" = CaT1018_督促状発行履歴_最大.督促状発行年月日 ) AS CaT1018_督促状発行履歴 ON 収納情報.収納ID = CaT1018_督促状発行履歴."shunoId" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT "shunyuId", "shunoId", "shunyugaku", "shunyuYMD" FROM rgca."CaT0701Shunyu" AS CaT0701_収入_明細 WHERE CaT0701_収入_明細."shunyuYMD" <= #{基準日RDate} AND CaT0701_収入_明細."sokuhoKubun" = false ) AS 収入 ON 収納情報."c_shunoId" = 収入."shunoId" ORDER BY 対象者情報一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo", 収納情報.調定年度, 収納情報."fukaNendo", 収納情報."tsuchishoNo", 収納情報."k_ki" ASC, 収納情報.収納ID ASC, 収入."shunyuYMD" ASC

SELECT 償還払支給申請.*, 償還払支給判定結果.* FROM rgdb."DbT3034ShokanShinsei" AS 償還払支給申請 LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT3036ShokanHanteiKekka" AS 償還払支給判定結果 ON 償還払支給申請."hiHokenshaNo" = 償還払支給判定結果."hiHokenshaNo" AND 償還払支給申請."serviceTeikyoYM" = 償還払支給判定結果."serviceTeikyoYM" AND 償還払支給申請."seiriNo" = 償還払支給判定結果."seiriNo" INNER JOIN "ShiharaiHohoHenkoTainoTempTable" AS 対象者情報一時テーブル ON 償還払支給申請."hiHokenshaNo" = 対象者情報一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo" ORDER BY 償還払支給申請."shinseiYMD", 償還払支給申請."serviceTeikyoYM", 償還払支給申請."seiriNo" ASC

SELECT 支払方法変更."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" AS 証記載保険者番号, 支払方法変更."hihokenshaNo" AS 被保険者番号, 支払方法変更."kanriKubun" AS 管理区分, max(支払方法変更."rirekiNo") AS 履歴番号 FROM rgdb."DbT4021ShiharaiHohoHenko" AS 支払方法変更 INNER JOIN "ShiharaiHohoHenkoTainoTempTable" AS 支払方法変更滞納者把握情報一時テーブル ON 支払方法変更."hihokenshaNo" = 支払方法変更滞納者把握情報一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo" WHERE 支払方法変更."logicalDeletedFlag" = false GROUP BY 支払方法変更."shoKisaiHokenshaNo", 支払方法変更."hihokenshaNo", 支払方法変更."kanriKubun" ORDER BY 支払方法変更."shoKisaiHokenshaNo", 支払方法変更."hihokenshaNo", 支払方法変更."kanriKubun"

SELECT , , 償還払支給.* FROM rgdb."DbT4021ShiharaiHohoHenko" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT4024ShiharaiHohoHenkoSashitome" ON rgdb."DbT4021ShiharaiHohoHenko"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = rgdb."DbT4024ShiharaiHohoHenkoSashitome"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" AND rgdb."DbT4021ShiharaiHohoHenko"."hihokenshaNo" = rgdb."DbT4024ShiharaiHohoHenkoSashitome"."hihokenshaNo" AND rgdb."DbT4021ShiharaiHohoHenko"."kanriKubun" = rgdb."DbT4024ShiharaiHohoHenkoSashitome"."kanriKubun" AND rgdb."DbT4021ShiharaiHohoHenko"."rirekiNo" = rgdb."DbT4024ShiharaiHohoHenkoSashitome"."rirekiNo" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT 償還払支給申請."hiHokenshaNo" AS 償還払支給申請_被保険者番号, 償還払支給申請."serviceTeikyoYM" AS 償還払支給申請_サービス提供年月, 償還払支給申請."seiriNo" AS 償還払支給申請_整理番号, 償還払支給判定結果."shiharaiKingaku" AS 償還払支給判定結果_支払金額, 償還払支給判定結果."sagakuKingakuGokei" AS 償還払支給判定結果_差額金額合計 FROM rgdb."DbT3034ShokanShinsei" AS 償還払支給申請 LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT3036ShokanHanteiKekka" AS 償還払支給判定結果 ON 償還払支給申請."hiHokenshaNo" = 償還払支給判定結果."hiHokenshaNo" AND 償還払支給申請."serviceTeikyoYM" = 償還払支給判定結果."serviceTeikyoYM" AND 償還払支給申請."seiriNo" = 償還払支給判定結果."seiriNo" ) AS 償還払支給 ON 償還払支給."償還払支給申請_被保険者番号" = rgdb."DbT4021ShiharaiHohoHenko"."hihokenshaNo" INNER JOIN "TainoCountermeasureMaxRirekiNoTempTable" AS 滞納者対策最大履歴番号一時テーブル ON rgdb."DbT4021ShiharaiHohoHenko"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = 滞納者対策最大履歴番号一時テーブル."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" AND rgdb."DbT4021ShiharaiHohoHenko"."hihokenshaNo" = 滞納者対策最大履歴番号一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo" AND rgdb."DbT4021ShiharaiHohoHenko"."kanriKubun" = 滞納者対策最大履歴番号一時テーブル."kanriKubun" AND rgdb."DbT4021ShiharaiHohoHenko"."rirekiNo" = 滞納者対策最大履歴番号一時テーブル."maxRirekiNo" WHERE rgdb."DbT4021ShiharaiHohoHenko"."logicalDeletedFlag" = false AND rgdb."DbT4024ShiharaiHohoHenkoSashitome"."logicalDeletedFlag" = false

WITH master AS ( SELECT 対象者情報一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo" AS 対象者情報_被保険者番号,
収納状況一時テーブル."choteiNendo" AS 収納状況_調定年度, 収納状況一時テーブル."fukaNendo" AS 収納状況_賦課年度, 収納状況一時テーブル."tsuchishoNo" AS 収納状況_通知書番号, 収納状況一時テーブル."ki" AS 収納状況_期, 収納状況一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo" AS 収納状況_被保険者番号, 収納状況一時テーブル."shikibetsuCode" AS 収納状況_識別コード, 収納状況一時テーブル."nokigenYMD" AS 収納状況_納期限, 収納状況一時テーブル."choteigaku" AS 収納状況_調定額, 収納状況一時テーブル."shunyuYMD" AS 収納状況_収入日, 収納状況一時テーブル."shunyuGaku" AS 収納状況_収入額, 収納状況一時テーブル."dunningHakkoYMD" AS 収納状況_督促状発行日, 収納状況一時テーブル."jikoKisambiYMD" AS 収納状況_時効起算日, 収納状況一時テーブル."jikoKubun" AS 収納状況_時効区分, 収納状況一時テーブル."finshNoKubun" AS 収納状況_完納_未納区分, 収納状況一時テーブル."miNoGaku" AS 収納状況_未納額, 収納状況一時テーブル."jikoKisambiJiyu" AS 収納状況_時効起算事由, 収納状況一時テーブル."tainoKubun" AS 収納状況_滞納区分, 収納状況一時テーブル."longestTainoPeriod" AS 収納状況_最長滞納期間, 収納状況一時テーブル."beforeTainoGaku" AS 収納状況_以前滞納額, 収納状況一時テーブル."beforeTainoKubun" AS 収納状況_以前滞納区分, 収納状況一時テーブル."pastYearflag" AS 収納状況_過年度フラグ,
償還未払い情報一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo" AS 償還未払い_被保険者番号, 償還未払い情報一時テーブル."shinseiProcess" AS 償還未払い_申請中, 償還未払い情報一時テーブル."shinseiYMD" AS 償還未払い_申請日, 償還未払い情報一時テーブル."shinseiProcessNumber" AS 償還未払い_申請中件数, 償還未払い情報一時テーブル."seiriNo" AS 償還未払い_整理番号, 償還未払い情報一時テーブル."teikyoYM" AS 償還未払い_提供年月, 償還未払い情報一時テーブル."miTsuchiNumber" AS 償還未払い_未通知件数, 滞納者対策情報一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo" AS 滞納者対策情報_被保険者番号, 滞納者対策情報一時テーブル."tekiyoKaishiYMD" AS 滞納者対策情報_適用開始日, 滞納者対策情報一時テーブル."tekiyoShuryoYMD" AS 滞納者対策情報_適用終了日, 滞納者対策情報一時テーブル."shuryoUketsukeYMD" AS 滞納者対策情報_終了受付日, 滞納者対策情報一時テーブル."yokokuHakkoYMD" AS 滞納者対策情報_予告発行日, 滞納者対策情報一時テーブル."bemmeiYMD" AS 滞納者対策情報_弁明期限, 滞納者対策情報一時テーブル."bemmeiUketsukeYMD" AS 滞納者対策情報_弁明受付日, 滞納者対策情報一時テーブル."shokanYMD" AS 滞納者対策情報_償還発行日, 滞納者対策情報一時テーブル."shokanHakkoYMD" AS 滞納者対策情報_償還証期限, 滞納者対策情報一時テーブル."sashitomeProcessNumber" AS 滞納者対策情報_差止中件数, 滞納者対策情報一時テーブル."sashitomeProcessKingaku" AS 滞納者対策情報_差止中金額, 滞納者対策情報一時テーブル."sashitomePaymentYMD" AS 滞納者対策情報_差止納付期日, 滞納者対策情報一時テーブル."koujoNumber" AS 滞納者対策情報_控除件数, 滞納者対策情報一時テーブル."kojoShoTeishutsuYMD" AS 滞納者対策情報_控除証期限, 滞納者対策情報一時テーブル."torokuKubun" AS 滞納者対策情報_登録区分, 滞納者対策情報一時テーブル."shuryoKubun" AS 滞納者対策情報_終了区分, 生活保護受給者.生活保護受給者_識別コード, 認定情報."yokaigoJotaiKubunCode" AS 認定情報_要介護認定状態区分コード, 認定情報."ninteiYukoKikanKaishiYMD" AS 認定情報_認定有効期間開始年月日, 認定情報."ninteiYukoKikanShuryoYMD" AS 認定情報_認定有効期間終了年月日, 認定情報."ninteiYMD" AS 認定情報_認定年月日, 資格情報.*, 申請中認定情報."受給者台帳_被保険者番号" AS 申請中認定情報_被保険者番号 FROM "ShiharaiHohoHenkoTainoTempTable" AS 対象者情報一時テーブル LEFT JOIN "ShunoStatusTempTable" AS 収納状況一時テーブル ON 対象者情報一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo" = 収納状況一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo" LEFT JOIN "ShokanUnpaidTempTable" AS 償還未払い情報一時テーブル ON 対象者情報一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo" = 償還未払い情報一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo" LEFT JOIN "TainoCountermeasureTempTable" AS 滞納者対策情報一時テーブル ON 対象者情報一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo" = 滞納者対策情報一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo" INNER JOIN ( SELECT rgdb."DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho"."hihokenshaNo" AS 資格情報_被保険者番号, rgdb."DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikibetsuCode" AS 資格情報_識別コード, rgdb."DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikakuShutokuYMD" AS 資格情報_資格取得年月日, rgdb."DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikakuSoshitsuYMD" AS 資格情報_資格喪失年月日, rgdb."DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikakuSoshitsuJiyuCode" AS 資格情報_資格喪失事由コード, rgdb."DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho"."hihokennshaKubunCode" AS 資格情報_被保険者区分コード, rgdb."DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho"."jushochiTokureiFlag" AS 資格情報_住所地特例フラグ FROM rgdb."DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho" WHERE rgdb."DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikakuShutokuYMD" <= #{基準日} AND (rgdb."DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikakuSoshitsuYMD" IS NULL OR #{基準日} <= rgdb."DbV1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikakuSoshitsuYMD") ) AS 資格情報 ON 対象者情報一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo" = 資格情報."資格情報_被保険者番号" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT Distinct(rgur."UrT0508SeikatsuHogoJukyusha"."shikibetsuCode") AS 生活保護受給者_識別コード FROM rgur."UrT0508SeikatsuHogoJukyusha" WHERE rgur."UrT0508SeikatsuHogoJukyusha"."gyomuCode" = 'DB' AND rgur."UrT0508SeikatsuHogoJukyusha"."jukyuKaishiYMD" <= #{基準日} AND #{基準日} <= rgur."UrT0508SeikatsuHogoJukyusha"."jukyuHaishiYMD" ) AS 生活保護受給者 ON 資格情報."資格情報_識別コード" = 生活保護受給者.生活保護受給者_識別コード INNER JOIN rgdb."DbV4001JukyushaDaicho" AS 認定情報 ON 対象者情報一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo" = 認定情報."hihokenshaNo" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT Distinct(rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."hihokenshaNo") AS 受給者台帳_被保険者番号 FROM rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" WHERE rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."rirekiNo" = '0000' AND rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."logicalDeletedFlag" = false ) AS 申請中認定情報 ON 対象者情報一時テーブル."hihokenshaNo" = 申請中認定情報.受給者台帳_被保険者番号 WHERE 収納状況一時テーブル."fukaNendo" >= #{業務コンフィグ_日付関連_調定年度} ) SELECT master.*,
FROM master LEFT OUTER JOIN
( SELECT ARRAY_AGG(CAST ("資格情報_識別コード" AS TEXT)) FROM master )
AS "ShikibetsuTaisho" ON 資格情報_識別コード = "ShikibetsuTaisho"."shikibetsuCode" ${出力順}
